title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Feb 27 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Thursday, 27 February 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Thursday, February 27 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Infowars Nightly News host David Knight breaks down the boiling situation in Crimea, Ukraine's peninsula, as citizens move to protect themselves from the pro-EU coup in Ukraine. 

Paul Joseph Watson joins the show to reveal the depth of the coup as Russian fighter jets are now loitering [sic] Russia's western border on combat alert around the clock. 

Also on today's show, Jakari Jackson explains how guns save lives and the latest examples of gun owners defending themselves from violent criminals. 

Lee Ann McAdoo also breaks down the latest developments in the "designer baby" controversy and the implications of genetically engineered humans a la Brave New World.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
